CmdLine: apt-get update && apt-get -y install php wget php-curl && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: wget https://johnvansickle.com/ffmpeg/releases/ffmpeg-release-amd64-static.tar.xz && tar -xf ffmpeg-release-* && cp ffmpeg-*/ffprobe /usr/local/bin/ && cp ffmpeg-*/ffmpeg /usr/local/bin/ && rm -rf ffmpeg*
Commands.Name: run
